doc.title: Rollerboy
doc.plot: A short comedy about a young man who's mission in life is to protect the streets from litter! Rollerboy dons his hockey outfit and trusty hockey stick and takes care of business with a swift hip check to anyone caught littering. It's not long before he faces a gang of thugs not willing to give up the streets and an opponent just as swift and talented on skates as Rollerboy. You'll think twice before you toss that candy wrapper on the sidewalk after seeing Rollerboy in action!
